text: Mario Götze (born 3 June 1992 in Memmingen) is a German footballer. He plays as a midfielder for PSV Eindhoven and the Germany national football team. He was part of Germany's 2014 FIFA World Cup squad. He is considered one of Germany's best talents. He scored the winning goal of the 2014 FIFA World Cup final against Argentina. On 21 June 2022, Götze signed a three-year contract with Eintracht Frankfurt. == International == === International statistics === Germany Germany Germany Year Apps Goals 2010 1 0 2011 11 2 2012 8 1 2013 6 3 2014 15 7 2015 7 3 2016 14 1 2017 1 0 Total 63 17 === International goals === : Scores and results table.
